document.full_text: with six of the team's players away for gold cup competition, austin da luz, selected 14th over all by the red bulls in the 2010 major league soccer draft, got his first start with the team.
document.title: a red bulls debut for da luz
lines_and_colors: with six of the team's players away for gold cup competition, austin da luz, selected 14th over all by the red bulls in the 2010 major league soccer draft, got his first start with the team.
